title: Provided that where a water course passes through low-lying land without well-defined banks, the Commissioner may, as determined by him, permit the owner of the property to restrict or divert the water course to an alignment and cross section
clause_text: Provided that where a water course passes through low-lying land without well-defined banks, the Commissioner may, as determined by him, permit the owner of the property to restrict or divert the water course to an alignment and cross section. Provided that, in case of trained nallah 6.0m marginal open space shall have to be maintained
